name: Escape One Room
description:
This is my very first game.
It was created for the "The Indie Tales Jam" (topic: "One Room")
It is super short, but I am just glad that I created something on my own and made it in time. Even though I could not implement everything I wanted (running out of time) I learned a lot and had fun.

Please note I did a little mistake. The big chest does not need a key to open up, but a code.

Movement:
You can walk around with W/A/S/D (make sure to step onto the time machine after it is fixed) and use the mouse to interact.

Inventory:
Simply drag and drop your items onto their destination.

Font used:
Press Start 2P
